name: Windows Media Photo File
summary: Learn about .WMP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
Adobe Photoshop with HD Photo plugin

content: WMP files also use the .WDP extension.
NOTE: Windows Media Photo is now known as HD Photo, which uses the .HDP extension.

description: Windows Media Photo, or "WMPhoto," image format developed by Microsoft; stores a raster image in a format similar to a .JPG; supports black and white, RGB, CMYK, or multi-channel graphic formats; also supports lossy and lossless compression optimized for digital photos.
